original_text: And when the king saw Queen Esther standing in the court, she won favor in his sight, and he held out to Esther the golden scepter that was in his hand. Then Esther approached and touched the tip of the scepter.
korean_text: 왕후 에스더가 뜰에 선 것을 본즉 매우 사랑스러우므로 손에 잡았던 금 규를 그에게 내미니 에스더가 가까이 가서 금 규 끝을 만진지라

sentences.original_text: And when the king saw Queen Esther standing in the court,
sentences.korean_translation: 왕이 궁에 서 있는 에스더 왕후를 보았을 때,

sentences.original_text: she won favor in his sight,
and he held out to Esther the golden scepter
and touched the tip of the scepter.
